price: donde vivirán por toda la eternidad y no desearán mudarse jamás.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبۡغُونَ عَنۡهَا حِوَلٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yabghūna ʿanhā ḥiwalan
